title: GoodEnding.Start.Node1
body:
<<changeSceneObject SceneShotController StartScene>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
the river is just below this mountain pass
we'll make a raft and float down it
wherever it takes us
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot4>>
How many miles do you think we've walked?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
In seven days?
How long can someone walk in seven days?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
I don't know.
The rain seems to have covered our tracks
I thought we'd be caught or something
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot2>>
So, if we make it back, what are you going to do?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
I don't know, find my sister.
What about you?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot1>>
I'll probably start a little store
with a room in the back for me.
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot3>>
...
I feel like since this all started
I've changed into another person to survive
and now that it might be over
I have to figure out how to be myself again
I don't know if I will
can I live as someone broken?
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController shot5>>
I wonder if i'll still have those dreams
where I transport myself somewhere
I don't feel the crystal powers as much as I used to
every day it fades a little more
but sometimes
I feel
a hint of it
